title: Harvest of the gulfs
creator_credit: John Leake, Peter Dimond, Motion Picture Associates and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: This film traces the research being undertaken by the South Australian Department of Fisheries into the life cycle, habitat and movements of the Western King Prawn in the South Australian gulf waters.
creator_credit_for_label: John Leake, Peter Dimond, Motion Picture Associates and South Australian Film Corporation
description: This film traces the research being undertaken by the South Australian Department of Fisheries into the life cycle, habitat and movements of the Western King Prawn in the South Australian gulf waters.
